title: Japanese gestures
creator_credit: Michael Noonan and New South Wales. Dept. of Education. Learning Materials Production Centre
brief_description: Demonstrates Japanese body gestures used in communicating, with a later comparison to the equivalent Australian gesture. It is divided into 14 sections and demonstrates gestures commonly used in communication by the Japanese and is useful for students studying the language.
creator_credit_for_label: Michael Noonan and New South Wales. Dept. of Education. Learning Materials Production Centre
